name: agentic-web-foundation
description: AWS tools to create agentic web foundation network

scripts.cloud:down: set -a; . ./cloud.env; set +a; : "${ProjectName:?Set ProjectName in cloud.env}"; aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name "$ProjectName"
scripts.status: set -a; . ./cloud.env; set +a; : "${ProjectName:?Set ProjectName in cloud.env}"; aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name "$ProjectName" --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.events: set -a; . ./cloud.env; set +a; : "${ProjectName:?Set ProjectName in cloud.env}"; aws cloudformation describe-stack-events --stack-name "$ProjectName" --query 'StackEvents[0:5]' --output table
